notes: All SVG files are lightweight and scale infinitely without quality loss
JPEG format used for photographic NDVI images to reduce file size
PNG format used for graphics with transparency and sharp edges
All images optimized for web delivery with quality vs. size balance
Color palette follows AirSwap brand: greens (#22c55e, #10b981, #059669) with accent yellows
